scripts.start-no-race: npm run run-build-no-race && npm run serve
scripts.start-race: npm run run-build-race && npm run serve
scripts.run-build-no-race: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true NO_RACE=true vite build
scripts.run-build-race: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true NO_RACE=false vite build
